1.0.name: wordpress/birdflat
1.0.description: BirdFLAT is a flexible flat design blog theme. Features the grid layout by a jQuery Masonry. and uses responsive layout and is therefore optimized for tablet pcs and smart phones. Features include the Theme Customize. You can choose the text color, link color, article footer color and header background color.
